error.signature: TS2307: Cannot find module '@/components/Button' or its corresponding type declarations

verdict.summary: TypeScript path aliases (@/, ~/) are not configured or baseUrl is missing. Configure paths in tsconfig.json.

dead_ends.action: Only configure paths without setting baseUrl
dead_ends.why_fails: TypeScript requires baseUrl to be set when using paths; without it, path mappings are ignored

workarounds.action: Configure baseUrl and paths in tsconfig.json
Also configure the bundler/runtime to resolve the same aliases

leads_to.condition: When path mapping misconfiguration leads to module not found

preceded_by.condition: When project references change path resolution context

frequently_confused_with.distinction: TS2307 is the general module-not-found error; path mapping error specifically involves alias paths like @/ or ~/
